title: Epicurious Recipes Scraper
description: Extract recipes from Epicurious. Scrapes recipe details including ingredients, instructions, prep/cook times, and nutritional information. Supports specialized recipe categories.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Epicurious recipe collection or search URL to begin scraping.

recipeType.title: Recipe Type
recipeType.description: Type of recipes to collect (e.g., 'vegetarian', 'vegan', 'gluten-free', 'dessert'). Used for categorization.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Recipe Details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, visits each recipe page to extract complete ingredients, instructions, and metadata. If disabled, collects only recipe titles and URLs.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Number of Recipes
results_wanted.description: Maximum recipes to collect. Leave empty or set high value to collect all available recipes.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages to Visit
max_pages.description: Safety limit on pagination pages. Prevents excessive crawling on large collections.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Residential proxy recommended for best results.

dedupe.title: Deduplicate Results
dedupe.description: Remove duplicate recipe URLs. Ensures each recipe is collected only once.
